mapper.select: SELECT course_overview, objective, teaching, book, evaluation, remarks FROM syllabus WHERE id_prof=#{idProf} AND id_pgm=#{idPgm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO syllabus (course_overview, objective, teaching, book, evaluation, remarks, id_prof) VALUES (#{courseOverview}, #{objective}, #{teaching}, #{book}, #{evaluation}, #{remarks}, #{idProf})
mapper.update: UPDATE syllabus SET course_overview =#{courseOverview}, objective =#{objective}, teaching =#{teaching}, book =#{book}, remarks =#{remarks} WHERE id_program =#{idProgram}
